SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.event.lifecycle

Interface EventManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
SingleEventManager
public interface EventManager
An event manager. Event managers handle the lifecycle of events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <E extends Event>
    void
    call(E event)
    Calls an event to be handled by subscribing listeners.
    void
    register(Listener listener)
    Registers a listener to this event manager.
    void
    register(Collection<Listener> listeners)
    Registers a collection of listeners to this event manager.
    void
    start()
    Starts processing events in the event queue.
    void
    stop()
    Stops processing events in the event queue.
    void
    unregister(Listener listener)
    Unregisters a listener from this event manager.
    void
    unregister(Collection<Listener> listeners)
    Unregisters a collection of listeners from this event manager.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Starts processing events in the event queue.

    • stop

      void stop()
      Stops processing events in the event queue.

    • call

      <E extends Event> void call(@Nonnull E event)
      Calls an event to be handled by subscribing listeners. The event will be added to the event queue for processing.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of event to be called
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be called

    • register

      void register(@Nonnull Listener listener)
      Registers a listener to this event manager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to register to this event manager

    • register

      void register(@Nonnull Collection<Listener> listeners)
      Registers a collection of listeners to this event manager.
      Parameters:
      listeners - The collection of listeners to register to this event manager

    • unregister

      void unregister(@Nonnull Listener listener)
      Unregisters a listener from this event manager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to unregister from this event manager

    • unregister

      void unregister(@Nonnull Collection<Listener> listeners)
      Unregisters a collection of listeners from this event manager.
      Parameters:
      listeners - The collection of listeners to unregister from this event manager
